title: Hungry Frog
description: Hungry Frog is a tongue-twisting 2D adventure where you play as a fearless frog snapping up flies with skill shots and clever tricks. Use your sticky tongue to ricochet hits, trigger TNT crates, move blocks, and unlock doors as you clear each stage. With dozens of levels plus a tougher New Game Plus mode, itâ€™s a fun, fast-paced challenge for anyone ready to gobble their way to mastery.
